import {CodeIcon} from '@heroicons/react/solid'; import React from "react"; import {Projects} from "../data"; export default function Project() { return(

App's I've built

I've worked on numerous apps ranging from interactive games, recipe search apps, Budget planner app, movie database, etc.

{projects.map((project) => (

{project.subtitle}

{project.title}

{project.description}

 ))};
) }
